And also Spanish Gazpacho is really different
from Moroccan Gazpacho, which is what I was
used to.

The Moroccan recipe has chickpeas and beans
so don't be surprised if you come to Spain
and there are no chickpeas in your Gazpacho.

And Gazpacho also comes with a basket of bread
